name: @hyperscape/ai-creation
description: AI-powered 3D asset generation system for Hyperscape RPG

scripts.test: echo 'AI generation tests would run here'
scripts.test:enhanced: npm run build && npm run test:generation
scripts.test:generation: echo 'AI generation integration tests would run here'
scripts.generate: npm run build && node dist/cli/index.js generate
scripts.batch: npm run build && node dist/cli/index.js batch
scripts.viewer: npm run build && node dist/cli/index.js viewer
scripts.config: npm run build && node dist/cli/index.js config

author: Hyperscape Team
